title: verify dlp policy by selecting single profile
custom_summary: verify dlp policy by selecting single profile
custom_preconds:
1. tenant webui should accessible
2. client should be up and running.
custom_steps:
steps:
1. login to tenant webui
2. go to policies -> Inline -> New policy
3. click public app access or DLP tab from dropdown menu
4. select any app
5. select single profiles
custom_expected:
1.File upload/download should be successful in alert 
2.The action generates an alert 
3.The block alert generated should hit the correct DLP rule as per the source file 
4.The object type is file and activity should be upload 
5.The alert and skopeIT event should contain proper object , object_id , device , OS , browser , From user , Alert type 
, alert , action generated , alert name , policy name
